title: GitKraken
description: GitKraken's DevEx platform provides a suite of top-rated Git tools that help millions of developers be more productive each day—and teams around the world collaborate more closely. Our products serve developers wherever they are and wherever they code, whether it’s in their IDE, on their desktop, or in their issue tracking system. More than 20 million developers from 100,000 companies around the world rely on GitKraken’s tools to make Git work for them. More information at gitkraken.com.
